name: tachikoma
description: Tweet from an account controlled by a smart contract.

scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run private-dids && npm run deploy && npm run mint
scripts.replica: dfx stop && rm -rf .dfx && dfx start --clean --background && dfx canister create ledger && dfx canister create tachikoma_backend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:ledger && npm run deploy:tachikoma_backend
scripts.deploy:ledger: PRINCIPAL=$(dfx identity get-principal) && dfx deploy ledger --argument "(variant {Init = record {minting_account = record { owner = principal \"$PRINCIPAL\" };transfer_fee = 0;token_symbol = \"ckBTC\";token_name = \"Token ckBTC\";metadata = vec {};initial_balances = vec {};archive_options = record {num_blocks_to_archive = 10_000;trigger_threshold = 20_000;cycles_for_archive_creation = opt 4_000_000_000_000;controller_id = principal \"$PRINCIPAL\";};}})"  --mode=reinstall -y
scripts.deploy:tachikoma_backend: npm run public-dids && dfx deploy tachikoma_backend
scripts.mint:
read -p "Enter the principal you want to mint tokens to (can't be the minter principal)
" recipient && dfx canister call ledger icrc1_transfer "(record {to = record {owner = principal \"$recipient\"};amount=100_000_000_000},)"

author: Moritz Fuller
